section.heading: Transition of licensed marriage and family therapists.
section.text: For a period of 2 years following March 10, 2004, all reference to a licensed marriage and family therapist shall be deemed to refer to a person meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether that person is licensed.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 10, 2004, D.C. Law 15-88, ยง 2(i), 50 DCR 10999
